answers.answer: I have also reach that point. If I try to force food down I end up with reflux. I eat more often... but it is harder to manage my blood sugar that way since I have gestational diabetes.  At least I guess I will help not gainning to much weight in my last month of pregnancy.
Thats what I was thinking lol. I had gestational diabetes with my last pregnancy. Wasn't fun :/

I am at the point where I just want this baby out! This is my third child and I am alot older this time then when I had my girls. My body is tired all the time and it is so hard to sleep due to my discomfort. Will February 7th hurry up and get here already. Plus I feel like the baby is super big. Lets hope I dont have another 10 pounder, like last time.
You're due February 7th? I'm due February 6th!:)

question: I've now hit that stage of pregnancy where I'm super hungry but can't eat as much due to babys growth lol I filled up my plate for dinner and wasn't able to eat half of it.
title: feeling full
